players.name: Alice
memory: You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it unfortunate that we've lost a valuable member of our town so early in the game. Let us all remain vigilant and work together to identify the culprit behind Bob's untimely demise."
Diana: "I think we should focus on questioning Charlie, he was the last one to see Bob before his death."
You: "Charlie, I'd like to question you further about your alibi for the time of Bob's death. Can you provide more details about what you were doing and who was with you?"
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
